answers.answer: Your post is more related to cardio than diabetes. Try posting on Cardiac Rehabilitation and Ask A Doctor - Cardiovascular Disease Prevention forums. For blood vessel assistance use Google search for 'vascular and circulatory forums'. MedHelp at this time does not provide one. Good luck -

question: 55 year-old male Type II Diabetic had stroke 9 years ago. Still recovering with diabled arms n numbed leg. Any tips to prevent more blood vessels deteriotion.Currently taking meformin(500mg day n night), Renetec(BP) , Lipitor and aspirin.Sugar level has been stabled: 108(fast)H1c: Avg  110BP: 85/135Exercise: casual walking 1.5 KM/dayThanks in advance, Doc!
title: Diabete With Stroke 9 years ago!
